text: ya sahby fi alsjn, 'iilaykuma tfsyr rwyakma: 'amaa aldhy ra'aa 'anah yesr alenb fi rwyah fa'iinah yakhruj min alsijn wayakun saqy alkhamr llmlk, wa'amaa alakhar aldhy ra'aa 'anah yahmil ealaa rasih khbzana fa'iinah yuslb wyutrk, wtakl altayr min rash, qudy al'amr aladhi fih tastaftian wfurgh mnh
